dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: You dare to approach me, mortal? What do you seek?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I come in peace. I mean no harm.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Peace? How amusing. Mortals like you always show up with false intentions.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I speak the truth. Let's find common ground.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Common ground? There's none between us. You will soon regret your words.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I apologize for the misunderstanding. Let's just go our separate ways.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Apologies won't save you now. Prepare to face the consequences.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I won't back down. I'm ready to face whatever comes.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Foolish mortal. Your bravery will be your downfall.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I can see this is going nowhere. Farewell.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Farewell? As if I care. Leave before I change my mind.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Enough of this. Let's end this pointless conversation.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bold words from a fragile being. It's time to teach you a lesson.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek information about this place. Can you help me?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Information? Mortals are always so curious, yet so ignorant.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I admit my ignorance. Please enlighten me, wise one.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Wise one? You mock me, mortal. Ignorance deserves no enlightenment.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I didn't mean to offend. I'll take my leave now.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Offend? Too late for apologies. Your ignorance will be your downfall.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I won't stand for insults. Let's settle this now.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Brave words from a fool. Prepare to face the consequences of your actions.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Never mind. I'll figure it out on my own. Goodbye.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Figuring it out on your own? How amusing. You will soon realize the folly of your ways.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your arrogance is intolerable. I'll take my leave now.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Intolerable? Such fragile egos mortals possess. You will regret your words.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek power. Will you aid me in my quest?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Power? Mortals always seek what they can never truly grasp.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I understand the complexity of power. Can you guide me?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Guide you? Only the foolish seek guidance from the likes of me.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I see now that this was a mistake. Goodbye.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A mistake indeed. Leave before your ignorance leads to your demise.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I won't tolerate such disrespect. Let's settle this now.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Disrespect? You dare challenge me? Prepare for the consequences.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I sense your reluctance. I'll find power on my own.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Reluctance? Mortals are so predictable. You will regret your decision.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I change my mind. Let's see if we can forge an alliance.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: An alliance? Your naivety knows no bounds. Prepare for disappointment.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: There's no point in further discussion. Goodbye.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Goodbye, mortal. Do not return unless you seek your own demise.
